name: Table Long courrier
description: This table was initially designed by Christian Liaigre for his house in Ile de Ré. A rustic house in harmony with the environment, whilst remaining sophisticated and unpredictable. The Long Courrier reflects the identity of the island - the fishermen's houses and nature. With its iconic base, it has become one of the Maison's classics. With an elegance synonym of simplicity and authenticity, the image of Ile de Ré.
